title: City firefighter accused of taking $1,000 from safe at Carrick members-only club
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Local - Today 
Pittsburgh police arrested a Pittsburgh firefighter Thursday on charges that he stole $1,000 from a Carrick nightclub owned by his former bu...
